2025.title: OLAF
2025.description: OLAF (Open Life Science Analysis Framework) is an open-source platform that enables researchers to perform bioinformatics analyses using natural language.

2025.title: BioPIM
2025.description: BioPIM leverages the emerging processing-in-memory (PIM) technologies to enable powerful edge computing.

2025.title: XenoBug
2025.description: XenoBug can predict the bacterial metabolism and biotransformation of enviornmental pollutants and contaminants, predicting all possible reactions, corresponding enzymes and their sequences from different metagenomic sources.
